content.rendered:
Who we are ?

About Us

‘LekhaWekha‘ is the trade/brand name for outsourced accounting services provided by AskUs Consultants LLP established in 2016 under the LLP ACT 2009 INDIA.
We exclusively provide our services to chartered accountancy firms/accounting practices and registered auditors across UK, IRE, US, NZ, AUS, CA and INDIA. We started providing our services in UK in 2016 and since then evolved as a best known outsourcing service provider in accounting, bookkeeping, payroll and taxation domains.

  • Customized services/working models
  • Cost effectiveness (We are the lowest cost outsourcing service provider in whole India)
  • Efficiency, Expertise, Quality and fast delivery of jobs are some of our other USPs.

Why Us ?

TEAM WORK

Ask for help, give help. We work well together.

LEADERSHIP

Have courage and inspire others. We challenge each other to be the best we can be.

CREATIVITY

Find a better way every time. We never get complacent.

MAKE A DIFFERENCE

Think broadly, act quickly. We thrive on change.

RESPONSIBILITY

We own our actions.

RESPECT

We create honest relationships.

CARE

Greatest Empathy to solve problems of our people and our client.

Our ambition is to serve dynamic organizations and unlocking the potential of our clients and our people. Attracting, retaining and inspiring the best people is at the heart of our people and culture strategy and requires an environment in which our employees understand how their contribution makes a difference every day. Our values underpin everything we do and serve as a declaration of who we intend to be and how we intend to achieve our ambition.

Our mission is to provide an un-parallel high quality service experience and to continuously grow through the execution of distinguish, fair, and high-quality accounting outsourcing services based on excellence creative teamwork and efficient client service.

DEDICATED TO YOUR BUSINESS

The Management/Co-Founders/Partners/Directors

Meet our dynamic co-founders who are partners and directors for various business operations and brings a wide experience with them to better your business, no matter if you are a small accounting practice or big one-they always have something to offer you which adds value to your business.

How We Work?

Our Methodologies

Method 1

FTP SERVER/DROPBOX/ONEDRIVE/GDRIVE EXCHANGE PROCEDURE

Quality work with Systematic approach
With a systematic and step by step process, you can get most out of outsourcing your work to us and take your practice to next level. The better you understand and follow the process … (continue reading)

Method 2

EMAIL EXCHANGE METHOD

In this method, the exchange of data and information happens through the email channel only. When you upload a job, you simply compose an email, highlights the name of the job as subject i.e. xyz ltd-YE 30.12.2020 or abc ltd-VAT QE 30.08.2020 etc. and then you mention all the relevant points in the … (continue reading)

Method 3

Remote desktop/VPN

In this method, you provide us the access to one your in-house computer through your company’s VPN or through any third party remote application like Team Viewer, Anydesk, Log me In etc.
The accountants at our end use the provided credentials to access to the … (continue reading)

Method 4

Online Software Procedure

If you use any kind of online software for bookkeeping, final accounts, payroll and tax i.e. Quickbooks and Xero then this is the procedure you would want to follow.
You either provide your access credentials to us to login to your accounting software or you create/buy a separate access for us and then … (continue reading)

Method 5

Desktop/Offline software

If you use any offline/desktop accounting software like VT+, Sage50 etc. and if you have more than one users on your license then you can provide the license details and login credentials to us and we can simply download the software at our end to perform all the desired accounting activities for you. The best part … (continue reading)

Method 6

Using Team Collaboration apps and software

There is one more way to exchange the information/data, share ideas, suggestions and to collaborate in real time with the use of Skype, Slack, Microsoft Teams, Whatsapp Group etc. and many more other unexplored apps.
You can create communication channels or group on the above apps and … (continue reading)
